short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The official non-custodial browser extension wallet for the Oasis Network.
short.zh_CN: Oasis官方非托管浏览器插件钱包

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ROSE Wallet allows you to:

1. Easily send, receive, delegate or undelegate your ROSE tokens, and view the transaction records any time.
2. Send your ROSE tokens to the Sapphire, Emerald and Cipher ParaTimes (and back).
3. Create multiple ROSE accounts with a single mnemonic.
4. Import any type of non-custodial ROSE account into your ROSE Wallet by importing its private key.
5. Use any ROSE account on your Ledger Wallet with your ROSE Wallet.

It currently supports ROSE tokens, more supported digital assets on the Oasis Network coming soon.
